bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a feeling as if an item were stuck in the throat, one that cannot be cleared by either swallowing or vomiting. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry ran she 蚺蛇：肉主飛屍，游蠱， 喉中有物，吞吐不得出者，作膾食之 , “The meat controls flying corpse [qi], roaming gu , with an item stuck in the throat that cannot be made to leave by swallowing or vomiting. Prepare a dish of minced meat and consume it”.
